channel.title: Comments on: Duran Duran “Falling Down” video

item.title: By: Tim Palmer
item.dc:creator: Tim Palmer
item.description: Duran Duran always come up with the goods. Nice video, and classy. A great band, and better now than ever before. Well done lads!
item.content:encoded: Duran Duran always come up with the goods. Nice video, and classy. A great band, and better now than ever before. Well done lads!

item.title: By: PeteScott
item.dc:creator: PeteScott
item.description: It's the revolving door syndrome that occurs with celebrities and rehab. The dialogue at the start is sadly, probably very accurate considering the subjects. I think it's quite effective. The black and white coloring is beautiful and I dig the string music at the start and finish. I'm not a Duran Duran fan in general, but this video drew my attention to the song. Thank god it's not another Girls on Film video, one 80's coke fest was enough. At least this is somewhat relevant to today.
item.content:encoded: It’s the revolving door syndrome that occurs with celebrities and rehab. The dialogue at the start is sadly, probably very accurate considering the subjects. I think it’s quite effective. The black and white coloring is beautiful and I dig the string music at the start and finish. I’m not a Duran Duran fan in general, but this video drew my attention to the song. Thank god it’s not another Girls on Film video, one 80’s coke fest was enough. At least this is somewhat relevant to today.
